step_box.name: Lonely Militiaman Step Box
step_box.desc: Bundles of amazing deals! Each purchase unlocks a new step with more deals! Higher steps guarantee the ^cE7FFLonely Militiaman^cFFFF card!
step_box.help_desc: Each step guarantees certain card pulls from the box! After each purchase, the box will move to the next step. The last step can be purchased an unlimited amount of times!
